text: I absolutely love MachineInnovators! Their ML platform is a game-changer!
Been using MachineInnovators for 6 months. Pretty solid, no major issues.
Disappointed with the recent update. Lost some important features.
Best investment we made this year! ROI is incredible with MachineInnovators.
The documentation could be better, but overall it's a decent platform.
Terrible customer support! Waiting 3 days for a response is unacceptable.
Just deployed our first production model with MachineInnovators. Smooth process!
Not impressed. There are better alternatives out there.
MachineInnovators team is always helpful and responsive. Great experience!
The platform works but it's nothing extraordinary. Average at best.
